title: Dragon Ball Z Movie 06: The Return of Cooler (Dub)
alternative_title: Dragon Ball Z Movie 06: Gekitotsu!! 100-oku Power No Senshi-tachi, DRAGON BALL Z 激突!! 100億パワーの戦士たち
description: Cooler has resurrected himself as a robot and is enslaving the people of New Namek. Goku and the gang must help.
